properties.areaDesc: Flaming Gorge; East Sweetwater County; Rock Springs and Green River
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 14 at 3:21AM MST by NWS Riverton WY
properties.description:
This a special weather statement from the National Weather Service
in Riverton.

* WHAT...Scattered areas of light snow today along with a gusty
west to southwest wind at 25 to 35 mph. Snow accumulation of
around an inch possible.

* WHERE...Sweetwater county including Green River, Rock Springs,
and Wamsutter. This includes Interstate 80.

* WHEN...Developing this morning from west to east across the
area, and ending around sunset this evening.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Expect areas of reduced visibility in snow
along with some blowing and drifting snow.
